reviews.review_msg: This is how math should be taught. Clear lectures with in-depth explanations and draws connections. Office hours are amazing - always gives thoughtful responses and makes sure you understand the material. An award winning professor and I now know why. Take him and you'll love math more than before!

Jamie is the ultimate example of a professor who cares about your learning. He makes the most complex of subjects easy to understand, and is willing to go through minor details to ease the confusion of a student. Easily one of the best professors at SFU (not just in MATH). I highly recommend any student to take a class with Jamie if possible!
Amazing. Took 2 math 301 and 304 with him. Fair assignments and exams. Give practise questions and exams are very similar. He is the best math prof i have had at SFU.

Matt is a fantastic prof. He is very willing to help you succeed in his course! Weekly homework gives you a good review of the material. Sample exam and practice questions can greatly help you prepare for exams. He also provides the free textbook for students! Just read through the book and ask questions. Learn Geometry and Symmetry with him!

MATH 304 - Geometry and Symmetry

Gives clear lectures and encourages questions after class if you have difficulty with concepts or (especially) homework. His exams were fair and allowed me to demonstrate my knowledge of the material. If you see this course being offered by him, I recommend taking it because it was generally easy to perform well.

Fun class for sure, definitely and interesting teacher. By far my favorite class this semester. Homework and Exams were fair and relatively easy. I definitely recommend taking math 304 (loved the games with Rose and Colin)
